text: Lekin in donoṅ meṅ baṛā farq hai. Jo nemat Allāh muft meṅ detā hai wuh Ādam ke gunāh se mutābiqat nahīṅ rakhtī. Kyoṅki is ek shaḳhs Ādam kī ḳhilāfwarzī se bahut-se log maut kī zad meṅ ā gae. Lekin Allāh kā fazl kahīṅ zyādā muassir hai, wuh muft nemat jo bahutoṅ ko us ek shaḳhs Īsā Masīh meṅ milī hai.
